  27. ‌type error =
  28.   | Illegal_character of char
  29.   | Illegal_escape of string * string option
  30.   | Reserved_sequence of string * string option
  31.   | Unterminated_comment of Location.t
  32.   | Unterminated_string
  33.   | Unterminated_string_in_comment of Location.t * Location.t
  34.   | Empty_character_literal
  35.   | Keyword_as_label of string
  36.   | Invalid_literal of string
  37.   | Invalid_directive of string * string option

  39. exception Error of error * Location.t

  45. ‌val print_warnings : bool ref
  46. ‌val handle_docstrings: bool ref
  47. ‌val comments : unit -> (string * Location.t) list
  48. ‌val token_with_comments : Lexing.lexbuf -> Parser.token

  50. (*
  51.   [set_preprocessor init preprocessor] registers [init] as the function
  52. to call to initialize the preprocessor when the lexer is initialized,
  53. and [preprocessor] a function that is called when a new token is needed
  54. by the parser, as [preprocessor lexer lexbuf] where [lexer] is the
  55. lexing function.

  57. When a preprocessor is configured by calling [set_preprocessor], the lexer
  58. changes its behavior to accept backslash-newline as a token-separating blank.
  59. *)

  61. ‌val set_preprocessor :
  62.   (unit -> unit) ->
  63.   ((Lexing.lexbuf -> Parser.token) -> Lexing.lexbuf -> Parser.token) ->
  64.   unit
